author: timbeiko
content:
**ACDE tomorrow 14:00 UTC**
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/943
Will share the zoom before the call  here. 

Hopefully we can go over all 3 of Verkle, EOF, and 4444 to determine what should be prioritized for both Prague and potentially Osaka. Also, it would be good to get a sense of when teams would want to schedule Dencun on mainnet for, assuming Holesky goes smoothly. We can potentially target a date this week and re-confirm on ACDC next week once Holesky has forked & we've seen  blobs expire on Goerli.

author: rudolf6
content:
Hola all, we'll be giving a quick presentation on Verkle at tomorrow's ACD. If anyone has anything they'd like to make sure we cover/answer, plz let me know here and will make sure it gets covered!
